channel.title: The Poetry Extension
channel.description: The Poetry Extension. Bringing poets and dancers from Canada, the UK, Ireland, and the US together, one face-melting gig at a time.

item.title: Dani Couture
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews Dani Couture.

item.title: Kaddy Benyon
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for July, Kaddy Benyon.

item.title: Soraya Peerbaye
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for June, Soraya Peerbaye.

item.title: Canisia Lubrin
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for May 2018, the bravely-beautiful Canisia Lubrin.

item.title: Caroline Bird
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for April – the frighteningly-talented, ultra-cool, Caroline Bird.

item.title: Sophie Collins
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for March – the precisely-fearless, uncompromisingly-honest, Sophie Collins.

item.title: Jane Yeh
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for February – the brilliantly-original Jane Yeh.

item.title: Rishi Dastidar
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our ‘Poet of the Month’ for January – the intriguingly-nuanced Rishi Dastidar.

item.title: Liz Berry
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson, interviews our Poet of the Month for December – the loving, tender, soulfully-intelligent, Liz Berry.

item.title: Mona Arshi
item.description: The Poetry Extension’s founder and curator, Natalya Anderson interviews our Poet of the Month for November – the peacefully-powerful, incisive, steadfast, Mona Arshi.
